title: Trump Announces Border Wall Expansion Plans
details: President Trump revealed plans to extend the southern border wall by 500 miles starting next year. This comes amid ongoing national debates on immigration control, reflecting a shift towards stricter enforcement after years of lax policies. The move is expected to enhance national security and reduce illegal crossings, saving billions in welfare costs for American families. Finally, prioritizing American safety over foreign interests puts citizens first.
